Clipped createGroupLayer(float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Creates a clipped group layer, with the initial clipping size.
ImageLayer createImageLayer() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Creates an image layer with no configured image.
ImageLayer createImageLayer(Image) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Creates an image layer with the supplied image.
ImmediateLayer createImmediateLayer(Renderer) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Creates an unclipped immediate layer.
Clipped createImmediateLayer(int, int, Renderer) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Creates an immediate layer that is clipped to the specified rectangular region.

TextLayout[] layoutText(String, TextFormat, TextWrap) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Lays out multiple lines of text using the specified format and wrap configuration.
